name: MetaGameSpace
description: MetaGameSpace is a tech brand developing its own Gaming Metaverse. Heavy developments have been done in this field and our first game “Genesys”, an open world action RPG P2E (Play To Earn BNB) game is already developed and going live before the launch.We, at MetaGameSpace believe in constant and rapid developments and there are 5+ games in this segment each one going live inside our Metaverse after “Genesys”.
